content: Investments Shorting DBS Vickers Securities Asked by AnonymousAsked on 14 Apr 2019How do you short a stock on DBS Vickers? Can't seem to find a option to do it?Beginner here, just trying to see all the options available! btw, should  Itry shorting? or no?1 answerAnswerBump0

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 14 Apr 2019You need to use another broker that offers CFD products.CFD allows you to legitimately short a stock.If you use vickers to sell a stock you dont own, you are shorting it naked. This will incur penalties and have other consequences.So, just get a proper broker for CFD0 comments0
